title: Secrecy Drug
sinopse:
Taku and Mutsuki are friends who no longer talk as much as they used to when Mutsuki gave Taku a brush off. A year later when their parents go on vacation and Mutsuki is left to look after Taku, Mutsuki slips Taku a few mysterious pills that put Taku in a compromising mood.
(from B-U)
